Dates (meetings)

This folder contains the meeting pages for the group. Each meeting is a standard Hugo content page with front matter. Keep the files sorted or name them with the date prefix to make them easier to scan.

Quick tips:

  • Create a new meeting scaffold with the archetype: hugo new dates/my-talk.md.
  • Required front matter fields: title, date, speakers (array).
  • The list page is generated from layouts/dates/list.html and individual pages use layouts/dates/single.html.

Example:

---
title: "My New Talk"
date: 2025-12-10T14:00:00+01:00
speakers:
  - "Dr. Example"
---

Short abstract or links.

If you’d rather keep meetings under content/research/, let me know and I can revert or create an alias. This README is for maintainers and does not affect the site build.
